label: 浜木綿
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: (Crinum asiaticum var. japonicum), conspicuous for its many layers of large, thin, strap-shaped leaves.  It grows in sandy coastal areas (p. 602n).
